In a way the initial Bitcoin ecosystem grew with a limited amount of VC money, so limited power.  One time some of these VC's and CEO's tried to steer Bitcoin in their own direction (Segwit2x) and they got burned. That's when the "hate" against Bitcoin maximalism was established.
